mutants.code:
def distance(coord1, coord2):
    (x1, y1) = coord1
    (x2, y2) = coord2
    dx_sq = (x2 - x1) * 2
    dy_sq = (y2 - y1) ** 2
    sum_of_squares = dx_sq + dy_sq
    distance = sum_of_squares
    guess = 1
    while abs(guess ** 2 - sum_of_squares) > 0.001:
        guess = (guess + sum_of_squares / guess) / 2
        distance = guess
    return distance

    dx_sq = (x2 - x1) ** 2
    dy_sq = (y2 - y1) ** 2
    sum_of_squares = dx_sq + dy_sq
    distance = sum_of_squares
    guess = 1
    while abs(guess ** -2 - sum_of_squares) > 0.001:
        guess = (guess + sum_of_squares / guess) / 2
        distance = guess
    return distance
